name: kiorex-healthcare-platform
description: Comprehensive healthcare platform with microservices architecture

scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:gateway
scripts.install:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../appointment-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../clinical-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../search-service && npm install && cd ../video-service && npm install && cd ../analytics-service && npm install
scripts.start:dev: docker-compose up -d postgres redis kafka elasticsearch minio && npm run start:services
scripts.start:services: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/user-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/appointment-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/payment-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/clinical-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/notification-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/search-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/video-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run start:dev" "cd services/api-gateway && npm run start:dev"
scripts.start:infrastructure: docker-compose up -d postgres redis kafka elasticsearch minio prometheus grafana jaeger
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm test" "cd services/user-service && npm test" "cd services/appointment-service && npm test" "cd services/payment-service && npm test" "cd services/clinical-service && npm test" "cd services/notification-service && npm test" "cd services/search-service && npm test" "cd services/video-service && npm test" "cd services/analytics-service && npm test" "cd services/api-gateway && npm test"
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/user-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/appointment-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/payment-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/clinical-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/notification-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/search-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/video-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run test:e2e" "cd services/api-gateway && npm run test:e2e"
scripts.migration:generate: npm run migration:generate:auth && npm run migration:generate:user && npm run migration:generate:appointment && npm run migration:generate:payment && npm run migration:generate:clinical && npm run migration:generate:notification && npm run migration:generate:search && npm run migration:generate:video && npm run migration:generate:analytics
scripts.migration:run: npm run migration:run:auth && npm run migration:run:user && npm run migration:run:appointment && npm run migration:run:payment && npm run migration:run:clinical && npm run migration:run:notification && npm run migration:run:search && npm run migration:run:video && npm run migration:run:analytics
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:gateway
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run build" "cd services/user-service && npm run build" "cd services/appointment-service && npm run build" "cd services/payment-service && npm run build" "cd services/clinical-service && npm run build" "cd services/notification-service && npm run build" "cd services/search-service && npm run build" "cd services/video-service && npm run build" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run build"

scripts.lint:services: concurrently "cd services/auth-service && npm run lint" "cd services/user-service && npm run lint" "cd services/appointment-service && npm run lint" "cd services/payment-service && npm run lint" "cd services/clinical-service && npm run lint" "cd services/notification-service && npm run lint" "cd services/search-service && npm run lint" "cd services/video-service && npm run lint" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run lint"
